description: Use this application to set up your Developer Portal in a few clicks
name: Dev Portal

api-gateway.description: Envoy API Gateway to route requests to the correct service and verify the need of authentication
api-gateway.name: api-gateway

crud-service.name: crud-service
crud-service.description: Use Mia-Platform core Crud Service to manage different instances of the service.

files-service.name: files-service
files-service.description: Upload, download and handle your files using MongoDB, S3 or Google Storage.

swagger-aggregator.name: swagger-aggregator
swagger-aggregator.description: Use Mia-Platform core Swagger Aggregator to aggregate the individual swaggers of all the microservices indicated in the configuration file.

dev-portal-marketplace-bff.name: dev-portal-marketplace-bff
dev-portal-marketplace-bff.description: This plugin allows you to create the backend configuration for the dev portal marketplace.

files.name: index.html
files.content:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">

<head>
  <title>Dev Portal</title>

  <link rel="icon" type="image/png" href="https://www.mia-platform.eu/static/img/favicon/apple-icon-60x60.png" />
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="/dev-portal/style.css" />

  <script 
    type="module" 
    src="https://cdn.mia-platform.eu/backoffice/bk-web-components/1.5.9/dist/bk-loading-animation.esm.js"
  ></script>

  <script
    type="module"
    src="https://cdn.mia-platform.eu/micro-lc/orchestrator/2.4.2/dist/micro-lc.production.js"
  ></script>
</head>

<body>
  <bk-loading-animation primary-color="#1890ff">
    <micro-lc config-src="/dev-portal/config.json"></micro-lc>
  </bk-loading-animation>
</body>

</html>

files.name: style.css
index.html
files.content:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">

<head>
  <base href="/dev-portal-backoffice/" target="_blank" />

  <title>Dev Portal Backoffice</title>

  <link rel="icon" type="image/png" href="https://www.mia-platform.eu/static/img/favicon/apple-icon-60x60.png" />
  <link rel="stylesheet" nonce="**CSP_NONCE**" href="./assets/style.css" />

  <script
    type="module"
    nonce="**CSP_NONCE**"
    src="https://cdn.mia-platform.eu/backoffice/bk-web-components/1.5.9/dist/bk-loading-animation.esm.js"
  ></script>

  <script
    type="module"
    nonce="**CSP_NONCE**"
    src="https://cdn.mia-platform.eu/micro-lc/orchestrator/2.4.2/dist/micro-lc.production.js"
  ></script>
</head>

<body>
  <bk-loading-animation primary-color="#1890ff">
    <micro-lc config-src="/dev-portal-backoffice-configurations/config.json"></micro-lc>
  </bk-loading-animation>
</body>

</html>

fields.description: Name of the user that is requesting access
